testimonial: “Josue transformed a vague task into focused debugging and explained every step so I could keep learning.” – Product partner (anonymous)

items.title: Portfolio site refresh
items.result: Relaunched this Next.js 15 portfolio on Vercel with refreshed copy, performance tuning, and mobile polish for the confirmed primary domain.

items.title: Deploy + debug win
items.result: Stabilized the GitHub Actions/CD pipeline by tuning caching and logging so every push auto-deploys without manual intervention.

items.title: Resume tune-up before/after
items.result: Reworked the resume layout and impact bullets, then exported a clean Word doc ready for sharing so the before/after story is obvious.
